description: Learn the building blocks of web development with HTML.

lessons.title: Introduction to HTML
lessons.content: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

lessons.title: HTML Page Structure
lessons.content: Every HTML document has a specific structure including DOCTYPE, html, head, and body elements.

lessons.title: Text Formatting & Headings
lessons.content: Learn how to format text and create headings using HTML tags.

lessons.title: Links and Images
lessons.content: Discover how to add hyperlinks and images to your web pages.

lessons.title: Lists and Tables
lessons.content: Create ordered, unordered lists and tables to organize content.

lessons.title: Forms and Inputs
lessons.content: Build interactive forms with various input types for user data collection.

lessons.title: Semantic Tags
lessons.content: Use semantic HTML tags to improve accessibility and SEO.

lessons.title: Audio & Video Embedding
lessons.content: Embed multimedia content directly into your web pages.

lessons.title: Iframes and Embedding
lessons.content: Embed external content using iframes and other embedding techniques.

lessons.title: HTML5 APIs
lessons.content: Explore modern HTML5 features like Canvas, Geolocation, and Web Storage.

lessons.title: Interactive Elements
lessons.content: Create interactive web elements using HTML5 features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Portfolio Page
lessons.content: Build a complete personal portfolio page using all HTML concepts learned.

lessons.title: Meta Tags and SEO Basics
lessons.content: Learn how to use meta tags to improve search engine optimization.

lessons.title: Accessibility (ARIA, alt text, semantics)
lessons.content: Implement accessibility features to make your websites usable by everyone.

lessons.title: Forms with Validation Attributes
lessons.content: Use HTML5 form validation attributes to improve user experience.

lessons.title: Custom Data Attributes (data-*)
lessons.content: Store custom data in HTML elements using data-* attributes.

lessons.title: HTML5 APIs (Canvas, Web Storage, Drag & Drop, Geolocation)
lessons.content: Deep dive into advanced HTML5 APIs for creating rich web applications.

lessons.title: SVG Graphics and Embedding
lessons.content: Work with Scalable Vector Graphics for crisp, scalable images.

lessons.title: Responsive Images (<picture>, srcset)
lessons.content: Implement responsive images that adapt to different screen sizes.

lessons.title: Creating Templates and Layout Structures
lessons.content: Build reusable templates and complex layout structures.

lessons.title: Using Iframes and Embedded Media Safely
lessons.content: Learn best practices for embedding external content securely.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Build a Blog Article Page
lessons.content: Create a complete blog article page with all advanced HTML features.

lessons.title: Semantic HTML5 Best Practices
lessons.content: Learn how to use semantic HTML5 elements to create well-structured, accessible web pages that improve SEO.

lessons.title: Metadata for SEO & Social Sharing (Open Graph, meta tags)
lessons.content: Master the use of meta tags for search engine optimization and social media sharing, including Open Graph and Twitter Cards.

lessons.title: Forms: Validation, Input Types, Autocomplete, Accessibility
lessons.content: Create advanced forms with HTML5 validation, custom input types, autocomplete attributes, and accessibility features.

lessons.title: HTML Templates and Shadow DOM
lessons.content: Understand HTML templates and how they work with the Shadow DOM to create encapsulated components.

lessons.title: Custom Elements (Web Components)
lessons.content: Learn to create custom HTML elements using the Web Components API for reusable UI components.

lessons.title: HTML5 Canvas Drawing and Animations
lessons.content: Create dynamic graphics and animations using the HTML5 Canvas API for games and data visualization.

lessons.title: LocalStorage and SessionStorage (HTML5 APIs)
lessons.content: Store data locally in the browser using LocalStorage and SessionStorage APIs for persistent user experiences.

lessons.title: Microdata and Schema.org Basics
lessons.content: Implement structured data using microdata and Schema.org vocabulary to enhance search engine results.

lessons.title: Accessibility and Screen Readers
lessons.content: Deep dive into web accessibility principles and how to make your HTML work better with screen readers.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Build a Contact Form Page
lessons.content: Create a fully accessible contact form with validation, autocomplete, and proper semantic structure.
